methods.name: doWaterSplashEffect
javadoc: Plays the {@link #getSplashSound() splash sound}, and the {@link ParticleType#WATER_BUBBLE} and {@link ParticleType#WATER_SPLASH} particles.

methods.name: getExperienceValue
javadoc: Get a fragment of the maximum experience points value for the supplied value of experience points value.

methods.name: getIcon
javadoc: Returns a number from 1 to 10 based on how much XP this orb is worth. This is used by RenderXPOrb to determine what texture to use.

methods.name: getValue
javadoc: Returns the XP value of this XP orb.

methods.name: hurt
javadoc: Called when the entity is attacked.

methods.name: isAttackable
javadoc: Returns true if it's possible to attack this entity with an item.

methods.name: playerTouch
javadoc: Called by a player entity when they collide with an entity

methods.name: readAdditionalSaveData
javadoc: (abstract) Protected helper method to read subclass entity data from NBT.

methods.name: tick
javadoc: Called to update the entity's position/logic.
